objects.moduledoc:
Main zendesk module.

Example: `use Zendesk`
Zendesk Account module
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk account settings
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk attachments
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk brands
Module that performs custom api requests
Zendesk Comment module
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk comments
Zendesk Error
Zendesk Group
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk groups
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk user group membership
Zendesk Job Status
Zendesk Organization
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk Organizations
Zendesk Request
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk requests
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk searches
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk tags
Zendesk Ticket
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk tickets
Zendesk Ticket Fields
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk ticket fields
Zendesk Ticket Metrics
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk ticket metrics
Zendesk TicketRelated
Zendesk User
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk users
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk user fields
Zendesk View
Module that contains fucntions to deal with Zendesk views

objects.name: account
objects.doc:
Create a zendeks account

`subdomain` the account subdomain, example domain, this will be joined with https://{The_Sub_domain}.zendesk.com/api/v2

`email`: the zendesk email

`token`: the zendesk access token

objects.name: auth
objects.doc:
Get the Auth for a Zendesk.Account

`email`: the zendesk email

`token`: the zendesk auth token

objects.name: domain
objects.doc:
Get the account domain

`domain`: the domain

objects.name: full_url
objects.doc:
Get the full url

`account`: the zendesk account

`endpoint`: the resource endpoint

objects.name: account_settings
objects.doc: Get the account settings

objects.name: delete_attachment
objects.doc:
Delete an attachment

`attachment_id` the attachment id

objects.name: show_attachment
objects.doc:
Show an attachment

`attachment_id` the attachment id

objects.name: upload_file
objects.doc:
Upload file

`file_name` file name uploaded

`file_path` the file path

objects.name: all_brands
objects.doc: Get a list of all brands

objects.name: show_brand
objects.doc:
Show a brand

`brand_id` the brand id

objects.name: request
objects.doc:
Perform an http request

`account` the zendesk account

`params` the params passed

Params can contain:

`verb` the http verb

`resource` the resource api to hit

`headers` the headers to send

`body` the map to send, will be encoded to json

objects.doc:

`ticket_id` the ticket id

objects.doc:

objects.doc:

objects.name: show_comment
objects.doc:
Get a comment for a request by id

`request_id` the request id

`comment_id` the comment id

objects.name: add_list_item
objects.doc:
Add an list item to a map

`map`: the map to add items to

`key`: they key that contains the list

`item`: item to add

objects.name: set_map_item
objects.doc:
Set a value in a map from a list of values

`map`: the map to set value` to

`key`: they key to set

`value`: they value to set

`allowed_list`: list of allowed items

`error_msg`: error message to throw if item is not allowed

objects.doc:

objects.name: merge_tickets
objects.doc:
Merge a list of tickets to a parent ticket

`account`: The Zendesk.Account to use

`target_id`: The ticket to merge the other tickets into

`ids`: A list of ticket ids to merge

`target_comment`: The comment to add to the target ticket

`source_comment`: The comment to add to the source tickets
